title: Garment Fragment
description: Garment fragment with discontinuous supplementary weft (or embroidered?) butterflies in center in red, brown, and green on beige plain weave. Seam up the center of piece. Several holes and some deterioration around edges. Question as to whether this is really Peruvian. H 30 3/4 in., W. 35 in. Source Transfer from Record Book, 1977 Credit Line John R. van Derlip Fund RBL 47.537 [Stendahl Collection]
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
